entry.summary: 吴说获悉，据 Kaiko 分析，随着美国监管和银行环境越来越不友好，欧洲市场可能会出现新的机会。2022 年，所有交易所新增的美元计价交易对数量从 400 个减少到 326 个，而新增的欧元计价交易对数量从 96 个增加到 165 个。 https://blog.kaiko.com/the-future-of-fiat-on-ramps-328f13ce4044

entry.summary:
吴说获悉，Yuga Labs 宣布 TwelveFold 拍卖结束，出价排前 288 名的将于一周内收到铭文，未中标出价将于 24 小时内收到退款。最高出价为 7.1159 BTC，约合 159,600 美元；最低为 2.2501，约合 50,400 美元。 https://twitter.com/yugalabs/status/1632878847778512898
吴说区块链: 参与 TwelveFold 公开拍卖教程（作者：贰玖@b4fomo） TwelveFold 是 Yuga Labs 推出的 BTC NFT，288个以拍卖的形式发售，官方提到了5种钱包工具，需要比特币支付，将于3月7日上午7点结束。截止6日下午5时，目前最高出价为2BTC，最低为0.0319BTC。阅读全文https://overjoyed-mist-7ea.notion.site/TwelveFold-f44b19827f8c413187c9e853ffa29364 https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1632672531827265537

entry.title: I still think you want to fade the inflation narrative at least through June (2022 peak rate of inflation). If not for all of 2023. Comps are easy bre...
entry.summary:
I still think you want to fade the inflation narrative at least through June (2022 peak rate of inflation). If not for all of 2023. Comps are easy breezy and expectations remain high (e.g. February consensus 6%; FOMC year-end dots at 4.4%). https://t.co/DJzzMQAd8U

entry.title: Labor market cooling
entry.summary:
Labor market cooling
Guy Berger: 1/ @LinkedIn Hiring Rate update: February was unfortunately a month of bad news: The US LHR was down 6.5% M/M seasonally adjusted, the biggest 1 month decline since 2020. Hiring is now down 30.8% from April 2022 (when declines began), and 27.9% Y/Y. https://t.co/nMd3IRfPpS

entry.summary: IOSG：GMX 全链乐高会挑战 dYdX 龙头地位吗？GMX 无滑点设计使其成为对鲸鱼交易者有极大吸引力的场所。但它的产品仍远非完美，包括受限的资产选择、流动性扩展问题、缺乏足够的协议级风险管理、对中心化报价的依赖以及次优的用户体验等。阅读全文：https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/uCZmF6tVuvXMnfljMoYT9A
